  • Uses of CoreReadLock in com.semedy.reasoner.api.reasoning

    Methods in com.semedy.reasoner.api.reasoning with parameters of type CoreReadLock
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    Reasoner.register(InterruptFlag interruptFlag, List<EventResultReceiver> receiver, CoreReadLock edbReadLock)
    Register several queries for events caused by sensors or in case of
    stream reasoning db caused by added facts.
    Every time events from sensors arrive there might be one or more new results.
    For every result receiver.receive is called
    This is used for stream reasoning
